duties_responsibilities.duty: Acquire new business in accordance with set targets and create new sales opportunities by identifying target markets.
Develop and maintain multilevel relationships with key decision makers to improve opportunities for new sales and account development.
Collaborate with the Account Management team to ensure customer satisfaction and growth in line with company budgets.
Responsible for sales in all Discova Destinations and sourcing new sales markets and channels.
Switch sell agents from competitor DMC to Discova and research and develop pricing and product strategies suitable for specific markets.
Plan and host agent FAM trips and attend trade shows.

education_certification.credential: Minimum Bachelor degree or equivalent working experience - Degree in tourism and hospitality is an advantage
